Package com.iopipe.http

This package contains the IOpipe specific classes and interfaces for communicating with the remote IOpipe service.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    RemoteConnection
    This interface is used to represent a single connection to the IOpipe service.
    RemoteConnectionFactory
    This interface is used to create connections to the IOpipe server for the purpose of sending and receiving requests.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    NullConnection
    This is a connection which has no effect and always returns the 503 Service Unavailable code.
    NullConnectionFactory
    This is a factory which creates null connections.
    RemoteBody
    This is the base for requests and results which both contain bodies.
    RemoteRequest
    This is used to store a request which is sent to a remote server.
    RemoteResult
    This is used to store the result of a request made to the service.
    ServiceConnection
    This class sends requests to the remote server.
    ServiceConnectionFactory
    This is a factory which can create connections to the remote IOpipe service to send reports.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    RequestType
    This is used to specify the type of request to make to the remote server.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    RemoteException
    This is thrown when there is an error connecting to, sending to, or receiving from a remote connection.

Package com.iopipe.http Description

This package contains the IOpipe specific classes and interfaces for communicating with the remote IOpipe service.
Since:
2017/12/17
